oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cuscuta campestris (Convolvulaceae): new addition to the alien flora of Assam, India
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Das, Barnali
Nath, Namita
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Convolvulaceae
Cuscuta campestris
invasion biology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cuscuta campestris is a well known holoparasitic angiosperm of the family Convolvulaceae. Here, this species is reported as a new addition to the alien Flora of the Assam state. Detailed taxonomic description has been given along with relevant information and colour photographs for its correct identification.
